subject: Snowboarding
Accidents and Safety
First Aid
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Jones has been exploring and snowboarding remote mountain ranges for over two decades. To minimize risk, Jones and his fellow athletes continually refine their mountaineering and rescue skills.
snippet: Jeremy Jones has been exploring and snowboarding remote mountain ranges for over two decades. To minimize risk, Jones and his fellow athletes continually refine their mountaineering and rescue skills.
